amol: Nafl prayer, dua, istighfar and Quran recitation
arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنَّكَ عَفُوٌ تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
bangla: O Allah! You are Most Forgiving, forgive me.
fazilat: Worship on this night is better than a thousand months.
rules: Increase worship during the odd nights of the last 10 days of Ramadan.

amol: Nafl prayer, repentance and seeking forgiveness
bangla: I seek forgiveness from Allah the Almighty.
fazilat: Allah showers His mercy on this night.
rules: Engage in prayer and dua from Maghrib until Fajr.

amol: Sending salawat, reciting Surah Kahf and making dua
bangla: O Allah, send peace upon Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ).
fazilat: There is a special time on Friday when duas are accepted.
rules: Make more dua between Asr and Maghrib.

amol: Fasting, Taraweeh, Quran recitation and charity
arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الصِّيَامُ
bangla: O believers! Fasting has been prescribed for you.
fazilat: The gates of Paradise are opened in this month.

arabic: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
bangla: There is no god but Allah alone.
fazilat: Fasting on this day expiates sins of two years.
rules: It is recommended to fast if not performing Hajj.

fazilat: Sins of the previous year are forgiven.

bangla: Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest.
fazilat: Expressing joy on Eid is also an act of worship.
Deeds are presented to Allah on these days.
rules: Fasting on these days is Sunnah.

fazilat: Dua made at this time is most accepted.
rules: Pray at least two rakats after waking up.
